paragraph.heading: 1Flat view
paragraph.paragraph:
The flat view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_format_flat_color.gif displays the feature body as it is seen at run-time (according to ancestor versions, if any). This is why it is possible to add or remove
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/40_debugger/20_breakpoints/index.xml breakpoints in this view.
